title: Back Street Crawler - The Band Plays On (1975) [FLAC]
description:
The Band Plays On is Back Street Crawler's debut album, founded by ex-Free guitarist Paul Kossoff.


tracklist:


    Hoo Doo Woman - 4:17
    New York, New York - 4:40
    Stealing My Way - 4:21
    Survivor - 3:35
    It's A Long Way Down To The Top - 5:58
    All The Girls Are Crazy - 3:33
    Jason Blue - 4:57
    Train Song - 4:36
    Rock & Roll Junkie - 3:17
    The Band Plays On - 5:02

lineup:


    Paul Kossoff - guitar
    Terry Wilson-Slesser - vocals
    Terry Wilson - guitar, bass guitar
    Tony Braunagel - drums
    Mike Montgomery - keyboards, vocals

    Pete Van - baritone saxophone on "Jason Blue" & "Rock & Roll Junkie"
    Eddie Quansah - trumpet, flugel horn on "Jason Blue" & "Rock & Roll Junkie"
    George Lee - flutes, tenor & soprano saxophones on "Jason Blue" & "Rock & Roll Junkie"
